com.github.peterbencze.serritor.internal.web

Class WebApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.peterbencze.serritor.internal.web.WebApi
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SecuredWebApi

    public class WebApi
extends Object
    A web API implementation that allows users to register HTTP and WebSocket endpoints that can be used to interact with the crawler while it is running.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WebApi(ServerConfiguration serverConfig)
      Creates a WebApi instance.
